articles.title: Social media companies all starting to look the same - Axios
articles.description: As Snapchat matches TikTok's feed, platforms are differentiating more by values than by features.
articles.content: Snapchat on Monday launched Spotlight, a video tab within its app that, like TikTok, distributes videos based more on how popular they are than on who created them. Facebook in August launched its Ti… [+1440 chars]
